name: Ultimate Ninja World
description:
Ultimate Ninja World is a multiplayer online game based on the popular anime Naruto. Here you can assemble your own ninja squad and relive all the epic stories of Naruto.

Assemble your own Ninja squad!
There are more than 100 Naruto characters in this game, and each one has unique skill. Not only you can find Naruto, Sasuke, Sakura and Kakashi, but also Itachi, Orochimaru and other cool villains! Help and develop your favorite character to become the best Ninja!

Amazing Skills
In this vivid 3D game world, you can enjoy all the epic and amazing Skills. Besides, we have a full Chakra type counter system which you may utilize into your tactics and strategies. Defeat your enemy and become the best!

Missions and Clans
Relive various epic missions from Naruto, complete and win your rewards! You may establish your own clan and play with others together! Can you lead your clan to be the most powerful unit in this world?

Clan war
Capture and hold Ninja villages, protect resource, use tactics and teamwork to improve battle efficiency. New rank and massive rewards are waiting for you!

Hurry up and join us! Collect all your favorite Naruto characters, together with your clan members to show the Ninja road of your own!

When the tree leaves dance, one shall find flames. The fire’s shadow will illuminate the village, and once again, tree leaves shall bud anew.
